meanings.definition: The act of giving birth to puppies.
meanings.sent1: The whelping of the puppies was a joyous occasion for the whole family.
meanings.sent2: The dog was in the process of whelping when we arrived at the vet.
meanings.sent3: The whelping of the puppies was like a beautiful dance of new life.
meanings.sent4: The whelping of the puppies filled the room with sounds of new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The whelping of the puppies was a miracle to witness.

meanings.definition: A young dog, especially one less than a year old.
meanings.sent1: The playful whelping ran around the yard with boundless energy.
meanings.sent2: We adopted a whelping from the animal shelter last week.
meanings.sent3: The whelping's antics always brought a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The whelping's curiosity was like a beacon of innocence in the house.
meanings.sent5: The whelping's wagging tail was a constant source of happiness.
